Osulation.description: A program that uses computer vision to play Osu with hand gestures. Won Best Use of Roboflow at MHacks 17.

Accel.tools: NextJS, Tailwind, Flask, Amazon Bedrock, Langchain, Hume EVI
Accel.description: An empathetic tutor that uses AI to provide personalized feedback to students. Won Best Use of Intel at Berkeley AI Hackathon 2024.

Polysolaris.description: A simulation of the n-body problem in physics. Uses the Runge-Kutta method to solve the differential equations.

OneVote.tools: NextJS, OpenAI API, Google Cloud, Tailwind, CSS
OneVote.description: AI chatbot tool that allows users can use to ask questions about candidate information, recent news, and more. Won Social Impact at MHacks 16.

Tunesphere.tools: ReactJS, Spotify API, Jupyter Notebook, Tensorflow, CSS
Tunesphere.description: Song recommendation system that utilizes sentiment analysis to introduce new genres to listeners. Won Best Design at HackTJ 10.0.

Othello Bot.description: An AI bot that uses minimax algorithms to play othello. Uses techniques such as alphabeta pruning and heuristics.
